channel.title: Little Help Please
channel.description:
ok, so i just got my specials up and running(only dds, maul, short bow, and whip, but with dds,maul, and short bow, theres no actiondelay, like wen your playing ive changed it so regular attks cant mass, but idk what to do about these, just got :( anyway all help is appreciated, specially if u could show me what it loooks like in code ;D
sorry its so noobish.
